item.title: Project V: Credit card fraud detection
item.description: According to the world payments report for 2020, the global non-cash transaction voulumes grew 14% (2018-2019) to reach 708.5 billion-the highest surge in the past decade. Also, itâ€™s expected that in future years there will be a steady growth of non-cash transactions as shown below: This is a good news for those who takes illegal ways to gain money from other’s credit cards. What can we do to face this kind of fraud and minimize the risk as much as we can?
